description: Generates (or retrieves) IdentityID. Supplying multiple logins will create an implicit linked account.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Attackers might attempt to generate or retrieve multiple IdentityIDs through brute force, seeking unauthorized access.
By linking multiple logins to a single IdentityID, attackers can modify the authentication process, facilitating persistence and evading detection.

securityImplications: Attackers might use GetId to get an IdentityID that might be then used to get AWS credentials.
